# Lecture 12 Why do ML Projects Fail in Business

## In-class Material

1. [Slides](../slides/w12.pdf)

### Extra Reading

1. [Ethics of artificial intelligence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethics_of_artificial_intelligence)

2. [Technology Can't Fix Algorithmic Injustice](https://bostonreview.net/science-nature-politics/annette-zimmermann-elena-di-rosa-hochan-kim-technology-cant-fix-algorithmic)

3. [We’re fighting fake news AI bots by using more AI. That’s a mistake](https://www.technologyreview.com/s/614810/were-fighting-fake-news-ai-bots-by-using-more-ai-thats-a-mistake/)

4. [Why Big Data Science & Data Analytics Projects Fail](https://www.datascience-pm.com/project-failures/)

5. [The Reason You’re Frustrated when Trying to Become a Data Scientist](https://towardsdatascience.com/the-reason-youre-frustrated-when-trying-to-become-a-data-scientist-2d2b8b402811)
